doc.title: Before and After
doc.plot: Moonlight garden scene. A couple wearing masks are walking through the garden. They sit down on a bench and the young man begins to make love to his partner. He removes his mask and asks her to do the same, but she refuses. After a great deal of persuasion she consents and discloses a face of a very homely old maid, the sight of which throws the young man into a fit.
